alert.note: Alert for Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area; Southern Inner Channels (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 16 at 3:06PM AKST until December 18 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT AKST FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph . * WHERE...Craig, Klawock, Hydaburg, surrounding communities on Prince of Wales Island, Ketchikan, and Metlakatla. * WHEN...From 9 AM Friday to midnight AKST Friday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest rates expected Friday afternoon and evening. A change over to rain is possible for Craig, Hydaburg, and Metlakatla Friday evening, which could limit snowfall amounts.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area; Southern Inner Channels
